Texts.Chs: 将一枚^orange;绿手指奖章^reset;带给^green;叶族肉食商店^reset; (位于^orange;科学前哨站^reset;)
Texts.Eng: Bring a ^orange;Greenfinger Medal^reset; to the ^green;Floran Meat Shop^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;
Floran hass losst fatherss ^orange;Greenfinger Medal^reset;. Iss sspecial becausse father hunted besst in tribe and killed many Hylotl in war. Perhapss you iss find in ^green;Verdant Ruins^reset;?
Oooooh! Floran thankss! Iss family heirloom! Floran givess friend reward! I ssteal thesse from Kevin when him not lookss because Kevin sstealss my pantss every week.

Texts.Chs: 让让让人悲伤的遗遗失物
